sentences.cn: …对行人和骑自行车的人的更好保护。

sentences.en: A good cyclist can cover distances of over a hundred miles a day.
sentences.cn: 自行车骑得好的人一天可以行驶一百多英里.

sentences.en: As the gladiators rolled away from the starting gates, a gasp went up when the Scottish cyclist's left foot clicked out of the pedal.
sentences.cn: 矫健的自行车手们纷纷骑车冲出起跑门，突然苏格兰选手的左脚咔嗒一声踩空了踏板，观众不禁倒抽了一口冷气。

sentences.en: Pot holes can is lethal for the unwary cyclist.
sentences.cn: 路上的坑坑洼洼骑车的人一不小心就有致命危险.

sentences.en: So we see advertisements in football grounds, on cyclist's shirts and racing driver's helmets.
sentences.cn: 因此我们在绿茵场上, 在自行车运动员的T恤上和赛车手的头盔上看到广告.

sentences.en: The car narrowly missed a cyclist.
sentences.cn: 汽车差点儿撞上一位骑自行车的人。

sentences.en: The cyclist came to a full stop at the stop sign.
sentences.cn: 这个骑自行车的人在停止标牌处停了下来.

sentences.en: The cyclist rang his bell loudly.
sentences.cn: 骑自行车的人使劲地按着车铃.

sentences.en: The cyclist turned off the highway onto a side road.
sentences.cn: 自行车下了公路岔上了小道.

sentences.en: The cyclist went at full sail along the track.
sentences.cn: 自行车手沿着跑道全速前进.

sentences.en: The cyclist went in full sail over the handlebars.
sentences.cn: 骑自行车的人伏在把手上全速前进.

sentences.en: The headwind chapped the cyclist's lips.
sentences.cn: 骑车人的双唇因顶风而皲裂了.

sentences.en: The journey by road to Wolverhampton is not recommended to anyone other than the most experienced cyclist.
sentences.cn: 除了经验非常丰富的自行车手外，建议其他人不要走去伍尔弗汉普顿的那条路。

sentences.en: The leading cyclist will be coming round that corner any minute now!
sentences.cn: 为首的那个自行车手很快就要从那个转角处绕过来!

sentences.en: The motor - cyclist raised / lowered his visor.
sentences.cn: 那个骑摩托车的人把面甲往上托[向下拉].

sentences.en: Well, I remember being run over by a cyclist as a little girl.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 我是个小女孩儿的时候被一名骑车的人碾了过去.
